text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem cs-rob-2-overall-judgment

This case-insensitive code system http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-rob-2-overall-judgment defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionDeutsch (German, de)
low_risk_of_bias Low risk of bias

The study is judged to be at low risk of bias for all domains for this result.

Geringes Risiko für Bias
some_concerns Some concerns

The study is judged to raise some concerns in at least one domain for this result, but not to be at high risk of bias for any domain.

Einige Bedenken
high_risk_of_bias High risk of bias

The study is judged to be at high risk of bias in at least one domain for this result. Or The study is judged to have some concerns for multiple domains in a way that substantially lowers confidence in the result.

Hohes Risiko für Bias

name: RoB2OverallJudment
title: RoB2 Overall Judgment
description: CodeSystem representing the overall judgment of risk of bias assessed by the RoB2 tool for evaluating risk of bias for randomized trials.

concept.definition: The study is judged to be at low risk of bias for all domains for this result.

extension.valueString: Das Biasrisiko der Studie wurde in Bezug auf das Ergebnis in allen Domänen als niedrig eingeschätzt.

concept.definition: The study is judged to raise some concerns in at least one domain for this result, but not to be at high risk of bias for any domain.

extension.valueString: Die Studie wurde hinsichtlich des Biasrisikos in Bezug auf das Ergebnis in mindestens einer Domäne als „mit einigen Bedenken“ behaftet eingeschätzt, das Biasrisiko wurde jedoch in keiner Domäne als „hoch“ eingeschätzt.

concept.definition:
The study is judged to be at high risk of bias in at least one domain for this result.
                     Or 
                     The study is judged to have some concerns for multiple domains in a way that substantially lowers confidence in the result.
